channel.title: Animation difficulties
channel.description: Recently I've been trying to add a full set of working monkey greegrees to my server in order to make a quest. I found a tutorial on how to get all the gorilla-shaped ones working, but I can't find the IDs for the weapon, run, walk, stand and block animations for each of them. I really only need a set of one more, as I just have to get the Karamanja, small & medium ninja and zombie monkeys working. Can anyone help me?

item.title: Animation difficulties
item.dc:creator: @choochoo choochoo
item.description:
@choochoo wrote:

Recently I’ve been trying to add a full set of working monkey greegrees to my server in order to make a quest. I found a tutorial on how to get all the gorilla-shaped ones working, but I can’t find the IDs for the weapon, run, walk, stand and block animations for each of them. I really only need a set of one more, as I just have to get the Karamanja, small & medium ninja and zombie monkeys working. Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
